subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: The long term outcome of this project is to enhance the capacity of the External resources Department (RED) to effectively and pro-actively intermediate between aid recipients and aid providers and in the process to have oversight, facilitate, coordinate, monitor and increase disbursement rates for donor inflows, and to capture and disseminate to donors and to Kenya Government comprehensive and readily accessible information regarding utilization of development assistance flows
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: 5KEN05502 - Harmonization Alig
